long_description: Ultralight yet warm, the Marmot Quasar jacket for men wraps you in 900-fill-power goose down for your alpine ascents. Down insulation delivers an unsurpassed warmth-to-weight ratio; it's one of the lightest, warmest and most compressible insulations available. 10-denier Pertex(R) Quantum(R) micro-ripstop nylon is strong yet featherweight. Shell features a Durable Water Repellent finish to shed light drizzle and snow. Angel-Wing Movement(TM) sleeves allow unrestricted range of motion. Zippered chest and hand pockets. Elastic-bound cuffs; adjustable hem. The Marmot Quasar down jacket for men stuffs into its own pocket.
short_description: Ultralight yet warm, the Marmot Quasar jacket for men wraps you in 900-fill-power goose down for your alpine ascents.
